name: foogallery-e2e
description: E2E Testing Infrastructure for FooGallery Premium

scripts.docker:shell: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec wordpress bash
scripts.docker:wp: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec wordpress wp --allow-root
scripts.test:headed: CLEANUP_AFTER_TESTS=false npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts --headed
scripts.test:debug: CLEANUP_AFTER_TESTS=false npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts --debug
scripts.test:ui: CLEANUP_AFTER_TESTS=false npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts --ui
scripts.test:filtering: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts tests/specs/pro-features/filtering/
scripts.test:filtering:headed: CLEANUP_AFTER_TESTS=false npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts --headed tests/specs/pro-features/filtering/
scripts.test:pagination: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts tests/specs/pro-features/pagination/
scripts.test:pagination:headed: CLEANUP_AFTER_TESTS=false npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts --headed tests/specs/pro-features/pagination/

scripts.test:exif: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts tests/specs/pro-features/exif/
scripts.test:exif:headed: CLEANUP_AFTER_TESTS=false npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts --headed tests/specs/pro-features/exif/
scripts.test:captions: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts tests/specs/pro-features/captions/
scripts.test:captions:headed: CLEANUP_AFTER_TESTS=false npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts --headed tests/specs/pro-features/captions/
scripts.test:album: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts tests/specs/albums/
scripts.test:album:headed: CLEANUP_AFTER_TESTS=false npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts --headed tests/specs/albums/
scripts.test:appearance: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts tests/specs/pro-features/appearance/
scripts.test:appearance:headed: CLEANUP_AFTER_TESTS=false npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts --headed tests/specs/pro-features/appearance/
scripts.test:hover-effects: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts tests/specs/pro-features/hover-effects/
scripts.test:hover-effects:headed: CLEANUP_AFTER_TESTS=false npm run pretest && npx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.config.ts --headed tests/specs/pro-features/hover-effects/
scripts.setup: npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run docker:setup
scripts.clean: npm run docker:clean && rm -rf playwright-report test-results .auth
